long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ziply is an AI Powered Social Amplification for B2B. 

Use Ziply to amplify your company's social content on LinkedIn and X
Leverage the trusted networks of your executives, employees, influencers and partners.
